content: from * to end r13 *k1 m1r k3 m1l k1 p2 repeat from * to end 72 st r14-15 * k7 p2 repeat from * to end r16 * k7 p1 p1r p1 repeat from * to end 80 st r17 * k7 p3 repeat from * to end r18 * k1 m1r k5 m1l k1 p3 repeat from * to end 96 st r19-20 * k9 p3 repeat from * to end changing to the 80 cm needle on round 20 r21 * k1 m1r k7 m1l k1 p3 repeat from * to end 112 st r22-25 * k11 p3 repeat from * to end r26 * k1 m1r k9 m1l k1 p3 repeat from * to end 128 st r27-30 * k13 p3 repeat from * to end r31 * k1 m1r k11 m1l k1 p3 repeat from * to end 144 st r32-35 * k15 p3 repeat from * to end r36 * ssk k11 k2tog ssp p1 repeat from * to end 120 st r37-39 * k13 p2 repeat from * to end r40 * ssk k9 k2tog p2 repeat from * to end 104 st r41- 42 * k11 p2 repeat from * to end r43 * ssk k7 k2tog ssp repeat from * to end 80 st r44 * k9 p1 repeat from * to end changing to 40 cm needle r45 * ssk k5 k2tog p1 repeat from * to end 64 st r46 * k7 p1 repeat from * to end r47 * ssk k3 k2tog p1 repeat from * to end 48 st r48 * k5 p1 repeat from * to end r49 bobble all st in pattern do not weave in end border and handles set up round with rs facing and 9 mm 40 cm pu but don t knit the exterior leg of the bobble orange stitches 48 st with col b green k48 place bor marker and join in the round k5 more rounds * pu the interior leg of the first bobble st whose exterior leg was pu at set up round and k it with the first st of the round pu interior leg of the next bobble st and k it with second st of round pass first st over second st to bind it off continue this way until 8 st are bound off pu the interior leg of the next bobble st and k it together with the next st on the left needle continue this way without binding off until there are 4 st on the right needle put those st on hold repeat from * three times and put the last 4 st on a 7 mm dpns 16 st total 12 on hold ** with rs facing bring working yarn to the right of the needle gently tugging at yarn and k4 do not turn this closes the i-cord repeat from ** until the i-cord thus made measures 36 cm 14 cut yarn leaving a 20 cm tail about
